'''''Sprites of Battle...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in the [[Flower-Feather Clan]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
*The challenges become accessible upon starting the following [[World Quest]]s: ''[[Molting Season]]'', ''[[A Saurian Returns to the Nest]]'' and ''[[Charge Forward! Go, Go, Go!]]''.
*The challenges can be started by interacting with the sign board at each start location.
**The sign boards are located in [[Quahuacan Cliff]] and [[Tezcatepetonco Range]] aboard floating hot air balloons.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the 1984 Japanese military science fiction novel {{w|Yukikaze (novel)|Yukikaze}}.
